snippet.title: PARANICHI: MAGICAL ROMANCE // FREE UPCOMING OTOME GAME
snippet.description:
To be released on Google Play on October 5th, 2022!

Join the release campaign and get valuable in-game items:
On Twitter → https://twitter.com/Abracadabra_Inc/status/1567135541740466176
On Facebook → https://www.facebook.com/AbracadabraGamesOfficial/posts/2063788720472674


Paranormal Nichijou - ParaNichi for short - is an urban fantasy otome game that fuses the perils of working in retail and life in a share house with fascinating supernatural mysteries. 

You'll take on the role of a young woman, desperate to strike out on your own, as you grow closer to your peculiar roommates. As you dig a little deeper, you come to find everything is not as it seems. Will you be able to unravel their secrets before it's too late?

Each route features over 100,000 words of story content, with each hefty dose leaving you thirsty for more. Two routes are available at launch, with a third in the works. The game also features unlockable fully-voiced scenes with your love interest!

Oh, and don't forget to choose wisely. Your life may depend on it.
